member.name: M:ApiApplication.Controllers.DataJobController.GetDataJobs
member.summary: Retrieves all the data jobs in the database.
member.returns: An instance of GetAllDataJobsResponse containing the collection of DatajobDTO

member.summary: Gets the data jobs by status.
member.returns: An instance of getDataJobsByStatusResponse containing the collection of DatajobDTO

member.name: M:ApiApplication.Controllers.DataJobController.GetDataJob(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns one datajob by its identifier.

member.name: M:ApiApplication.Controllers.DataJobController.Create(ApiApplication.Contracts.CreateDataJobRequest)
member.param: Instance of CreateDataJobRequest containing the new datajob data

member.name: M:ApiApplication.Controllers.DataJobController.Update(ApiApplication.Contracts.UpdateDataJobRequest)
member.summary: Updates the datajob with the new data

member.name: M:ApiApplication.Controllers.DataJobController.GetBackgroundProcessStatus(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the status of a background process
